name: Military Tanks
description:
Military Tanks is probably the best free tank game today that you can imagine!
This is a truly exciting and dynamic modern war game in which you can take part in exciting and fast tank battles.

Millions of players from all over the world participate in a large military battle, controlling various types of tanks and other combat vehicles. Everyone can take part in tactical battles on huge different maps!

Truly exciting tactical battles and a realistic blitz-arena for online battles are always with you! Military Tanks is a free multiplayer (MMO) tank game that combines two types of amazing gameplay: on the one hand, it is a realistic tank simulator, and on the other hand, it is an addictive arcade war game.

Just imagine that you will always have a realistic online military game in your pocket in which you can control heavy combat vehicles and any of their modifications available right now! So what are you waiting for? Join dynamic tank battles with modern graphics and endless action for free!

VARIETY AND VARIABILITY
Depending on the conditions and characteristics of each particular battle, you can choose which tank technique is more suitable:
- fast and maneuverable light tanks
- universal tanks of the middle weight category
- powerful and crushing heavy tanks
Choose any tank from dozens of available vehicles and take part in PvP battles!

CONTINUOUS DEVELOPMENT AND PROGRESS
Upgrade your tanks - change all sorts of guns and cannons, install additional equipment on your combat vehicles to crush your opponents on the battlefield. Explore new modifications and tanks, progressing in the development of technology from light entry-level vehicles to crushing and heavy tanks of the max level.

ONLINE BATTLE AND MULTIPLAYER
Play online in multiplayer mode, unlock new combat vehicles and upgrades, explore the landscape and terrain features in a variety of realistic arenas and enjoy stunning graphics.
Playing online, you will find yourself in completely different locations:
- WWII coasts
- winter snowy plains
- endless and hot deserts
- huge cities and quiet villages
- river valleys, mountain passes and many, many others.

PERFORMANCE AND OPTIMIZATION
Military Tanks supports most modern gaming devices. The game is automatically optimized for each model so that you can enjoy the game in the best quality - with cool effects and maximum detail. With manual settings you can find a balance between picture quality and high FPS.

We are constantly working to improve our game and improve the gameplay. Therefore, in addition to optimization in our online tanks, there is constantly updated content, including vehicles, new maps and missions, temporary events and much more
